data.title: SIGINT / EW Solutions
data.meta_description: For customers in defense and security, Rohde & Schwarz delivers complete Signals intelligence and Electronic Warfare solutions. More information.
data.text:
For customers in defense and security, Rohde & Schwarz delivers complete intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance solutions

Rohde & Schwarz strategic signals intelligence (SIGINT) and tactical electronic warfare (EW) systems, provide early information gathering and preventive crisis management, help to avoid conflicts and detect criminal activities.

A changing world-political landscape, the increasing diversity of wireless communications and the presence of asymmetric threats are making it more difficult to detect and pursue organized crime and terrorists. Modular concepts and custom-built solutions are required to allow the targeted adaptation of existing monitoring systems to the ever-growing number of new communications standards and equipment.

SIGINT / EW systems from Rohde & Schwarz support information gathering for all strategic and tactical levels. A complete product portfolio that covers everything from the antenna over the situation picture to field-proven C-ESM and C-ECM solutions can be provided. If necessary, these systems can be integrated into an existing C4I structure. The information obtained from different sensors is processed in the Analysis/Evaluation Center and if necessary, additional sensors can be integrated using standardized system interfaces.
